content.en: Algorithmic management: Algorithms are being used in the management of gastric leaks after laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy, helping to determine patient eligibility for percutaneous drainage and guiding therapeutic management based on a new CT scan classification. However, algorithms have not been proposed for the diagnosis and treatment of gastric leaks in a multicenter setting. Additionally, algorithms are being developed to reduce the number of endoscopic procedures for sleeve gastrectomy leaks by considering leak size.
content.da: Algoritmisk forvaltning: Algoritmer anvendes til håndtering af gastriske lækager efter laparoskopisk sleeve gastrektomi, hvor de hjælper med at bestemme patienters egnethed til perkutan dræning og vejleder terapeutisk forvaltning baseret på en ny CT-scanklassifikation. Dog er der endnu ikke blevet foreslået algoritmer til diagnosticering og behandling af gastriske lækager i et multicenter miljø. Derudover udvikles algoritmer for at reducere antallet af endoskopiske procedurer for sleeve gastrektomilækager ved at tage størrelsen af lækagen i betragtning.
